name: Dio Orsius Deck
author: Werd_Web_Dev
description: Epic Duels-compatible deck for Dio Orsius, the Soulforged Judge.

cards.name: Disciplined Strike
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy and gain Focused.

cards.name: Shield Bash
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage and push the target 2 squares.

cards.name: Parry Stance
cards.rulesText: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, keep 1, return the rest in any order.

cards.name: Mark of Judgment
cards.rulesText: Target enemy becomes Vulnerable until your next turn.

cards.name: Swift Sentence
cards.rulesText: Teleport up to 3 squares; if you end adjacent to a Vulnerable enemy, deal 4 damage.

cards.name: Justiceâ€™s Reprieve
cards.rulesText: Reaction: cancel an attack on an ally; attacker takes 2 damage.

cards.name: Soul Spear
cards.rulesText: Deal 6 damage to an enemy within 6 squares.

cards.name: Ethereal Shield
cards.rulesText: Gain a 6-point shield that lasts until your next turn.

cards.name: Spectral Step
cards.rulesText: Gain Phase-Shifted until your next turn.

cards.name: Coordinated Execution
cards.rulesText: Pull a Vulnerable enemy 3 squares; if it collides with terrain it takes 3 damage.

cards.name: Righteous Binding
cards.rulesText: Enemy is Immobilized and Silenced until its next turn.

cards.name: Divine Verdict
cards.rulesText: Opponent discards 1 random card and becomes Cursed.

cards.name: Spirit Hook
cards.rulesText: Pull one target 3 squares toward you.
